name: hubot-enterprise
description: Hubot middleware and scripts for enterprise

scripts.test: ARTIFACTS_DIR='./' COVERAGE_DIR='./' TEST_DIR='./test/' jenkins-mocha --compilers "coffee:coffee-script" --check-leaks --no-coverage test/**/*.coffee || true
scripts.tdd: echo '**WARNING**: Please restart after adding new test files' && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --recursive --watch --growl --check-leaks --compilers "coffee:coffee-script" ./test/**/*.coffee
scripts.test-integration: echo '**WARNING**: Please restart after adding new test files' && ./node_modules/.bin/mocha --growl --check-leaks --compilers "coffee:coffee-script" ./integration/**/*.coffee

author: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE)
